tags.name: tinto-image
tags.description: Versatile image component with lazy-loading, placeholder, aspect-ratio box, rounded presets, animation, and interactive link/button modes.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: Image source URL.

attributes.name: alt
attributes.description: Alternative text for the image.

attributes.name: ratio
attributes.description: Aspect ratio in the form "w:h" (e.g. 16:9, 1:1, 4:3). Defaults to 16:9.

attributes.name: fit
attributes.description: CSS object-fit for the image.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: CSS object-position for the image (e.g. 50% 50%, center top).

attributes.name: radius
attributes.description: Custom border-radius for the frame (overrides rounded preset).

attributes.name: rounded
attributes.description: Rounded corner preset. Aliases map internally to the main variants.

attributes.name: border
attributes.description: Border style for the frame (e.g. 1px solid rgba(...)).

attributes.name: shadow
attributes.description: Box-shadow for the frame.

attributes.name: background
attributes.description: Background color behind the image (used as frame background).

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Host inline-size/width (e.g. 320px, 100%, 20rem).

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Host block-size/height (enables height-fill mode instead of aspect-ratio).

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Native loading policy for the image.

attributes.name: priority
attributes.description: If present/true, the image is treated as high priority (eager + preload link).

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Low-res/blurred placeholder image URL shown before main image is loaded.

attributes.name: srcset
attributes.description: Native srcset attribute for responsive images.

attributes.name: sizes
attributes.description: Native sizes attribute for responsive images.

attributes.name: decoding
attributes.description: Image decoding hint.

attributes.name: crossorigin
attributes.description: CORS setting for the image request (mirrors HTMLImageElement.crossOrigin).

attributes.name: referrerpolicy
attributes.description: Referrer policy for the image request.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: When set, wraps the image in an anchor (<a>) pointing to this URL.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Link target when href is set.

attributes.name: rel
attributes.description: Link rel attribute. When target="_blank", noopener noreferrer are automatically added.

attributes.name: download
attributes.description: If set on a link, enables download behavior (supports empty string or filename).

attributes.name: as
attributes.description: Render mode for interactivity. When set to "button", wraps the frame in a <button>.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disabled state. In link mode prevents clicks; in button mode disables the button.

attributes.name: animation
attributes.description: Built-in image animation preset.

attributes.name: play
attributes.description: Controls whether the animation is playing. false pauses the animation.

attributes.name: rotate
attributes.description: Spin direction for spin-like animations.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: Animation duration in seconds (e.g. 20).

attributes.name: repeat
attributes.description: Animation repeat count. Use "infinite" or a finite iteration count.

attributes.name: pause-on-hover
attributes.description: If present/true, pauses the animation while the pointer hovers over the image.

attributes.name: start-on-viewport
attributes.description: If present/true, the animation only plays when the component is in the viewport.
